text: Uniharule bhandachanh ki yadi hami tapa'iko sathama yasa margadarsanako anusarana gardachaum bhane aphno bhuâ€“bhagabata apaharita garihalinechaum. Ke khataraharubata suraksita santipurna harama (makka) ma hamile uniharula'i sarana di'enaum, jaham hareka prakarako jivika purya'incha ra yo jivika hamro tarphabata ho, tara uniharumadhye dheraile bujhdainan
